## StreamOptionsProvider type

### StreamOptionsProvider type

This allows data sources to customize the streaming connection query

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare type StreamOptionsProvider<TQuery extends DataQuery = DataQuery> = (request: DataQueryRequest<TQuery>, frame: DataFrame) => Partial<StreamingFrameOptions>;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { StreamOptionsProvider } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
